faqs.question: Do you offer organic products?
faqs.answer: Yes! We have a wide selection of organic products across all categories including fruits, vegetables, dairy, and pantry items.

faqs.question: What are your delivery options?
faqs.answer: We offer same-day and next-day delivery. Free delivery on orders over $50!

faqs.question: Do you have fresh produce daily?
faqs.answer: Yes! We receive fresh produce deliveries daily to ensure the highest quality.

popular_dishes.name: Organic Apples
popular_dishes.description: Fresh organic apples from local farms

vegetarian.description: We have a wide range of vegetarian products including fresh produce, dairy, and plant-based alternatives.

vegan.description: Explore our vegan section with plant-based alternatives and fresh produce.

organic.description: All our organic products are certified and sourced from trusted suppliers.
organic.note: Look for the green organic label!

gluten_free.description: We stock a variety of gluten-free products.
